Interface Growable

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface Growable
extends Animated
    A group of methods for classes of objects that are can grow.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void grow(int pct, double sec)
      Grows the object by a certain percent.

    • Method Detail

      • grow

        void grow(int newWidth,
        int newHeight,
        double sec)
        Grows the object to a new size.
        Parameters:
        newWidth - the new width.
        newHeight - the new height.
        sec - The number of seconds it takes to grow the object.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

      • grow

        void grow(int pct,
        double sec)
        Grows the object by a certain percent.
        Parameters:
        pct - the percentage by which the object grows. If it is negative, the object shrinks.
        sec - the number of seconds it takes to grow the object.
        Since:
        CAH1.0
